+#ifndef TENSORFLOW_CORE_COMMON_RUNTIME_MKL_LAYER_REGISTRY_H_
+#define TENSORFLOW_CORE_COMMON_RUNTIME_MKL_LAYER_REGISTRY_H_
+
+#ifdef INTEL_MKL
+
+#include <set>
+#include <map>
+#include <utility>
+#include <string>
+
+#include "tensorflow/core/framework/types.pb.h"
+
+namespace tensorflow {
+
+// A global MKLLayerRegistry is used to hold information about all MKL-compliant
+// layers. Registry maintains information about <opname,T> pair supported
+// by MKL API.
+class MklLayerRegistry {
body: We need a mechanism to track which layers are supported by MKL and the input datatypes that are supported by the MKL layer. An example of this registration is in mkl_conv_ops.cc: 416, where call is: REGISTER_MKL_LAYER_float("MklConv2D").
body_html: We need a mechanism to track which layers are supported by MKL and the input datatypes that are supported by the MKL layer. An example of this registration is in mkl_conv_ops.cc: 416, where call is: REGISTER_MKL_LAYER_float("MklConv2D").
body_text: We need a mechanism to track which layers are supported by MKL and the input datatypes that are supported by the MKL layer. An example of this registration is in mkl_conv_ops.cc: 416, where call is: REGISTER_MKL_LAYER_float("MklConv2D").
